name: Stardust VR
description: Stardust is a VR action-relaxation game inspired by the classic Space Invaders arcade set in relaxing and charming world with Binaural 3d sound. Play solo, co-op, or PvP with a friend as you shoot, dodge, and create black-holes along your way to the top of the world leaderboard.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 sp1 x64 , Win 10 x64 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 sp1 x64 , Win 10 x64 Processor: i7 4790K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
